desc: Jimmy Tyrrell is a professional Fly Dresser, Writer, Fishing Guide & Casting Instructor. Visit our shop for an extensive selection of Salmon Flies, River Flies, Pike Flies, Lough Flies & more. Jimmy also writes about flies and fly tying for the Irish Angler magazine, Countryside Ireland and the Irish Times newspaper.

layout.text: Professional Fly Dresser, Writer, Fishing Guide & Casting Instructor
